titleInfo.title: Anonymous draft of a letter to 'Mon Cher Ami,' 1832 Mar. 18

mods.abstract: Anonymous draft of a letter dedicated to Count Thibeadou or Thibeaudon. The author writes on the differences between the United States government and European governments.
mods.note: March 18, 1832, Anonymous draft of a letter to 'Mon Cher Ami.' 'Dedicace au comte de [scratched out] Thibeaudou [or Thibeaudon].' This draft with many corrections on it is a lengthy treatise on United States government as compared to European governments.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Division, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Doussan Family Papers, Mss. 4800, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, Louisiana.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
